T02TD3137E:316a-1: s'a dha nam sarba karma n'a ma /
T02TD3137E:316a-3: sgrub thabs thams cad kyi las ka zhes bya ba /
T02TD3137E:316a-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3137E:316a-5: dus gsum mgon po 'gro don mdzad //
T02TD3137E:316a-6: ston pa de la gus btud de ;
T02TD3137E:316a-7: / sgrub pos nang dang nub sogs su //
T02TD3137E:316a-8: tshogs chen dag ni bsags pa dang //
T02TD3137E:316a-9: sgrub thabs kun na mi gsal ba'i //
T02TD3137E:316a-10: bdun po rnam dag gsal bar bstan //
T02TD3137E:316a-11: bde gshegs mtha' dag mkha' la dmigs //
T02TD3137E:316a-12: dus gsum gyi ni bla ma dang //
T02TD3137E:316a-13: phyogs rnams kun gyi bde gshegs dang //
T02TD3137E:316a-16: 'jig rten khams ni thams cad na //
T02TD3137E:316a-17: mchod pa bla na yod pa dang //
T02TD3137E:316a-18: mchod pa bla na med pa yis //
T02TD3137E:316a-19: de dag la ni mchod par bgyi //
T02TD3137E:316a-20: 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas //
T02TD3137E:316b-0: @316b nyon mongs srad bus bcings gyur pas //
T02TD3137E:316b-1: mi shes dbang gis bgyis pa yi //
T02TD3137E:316b-2: lci dang yang ba'i sdig bsags pa //
T02TD3137E:316b-3: mgon po'i tshogs la so sor bshags //
T02TD3137E:316b-4: 'das dus sangs rgyas ji snyed dang //
T02TD3137E:316b-5: da ltar phyogs bcu'i zhing na bzhugs //
T02TD3137E:316b-6: de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang //
T02TD3137E:316b-7: dus gsum sangs rgyas de dag gis //
T02TD3137E:316b-8: zab cing rgya che'i chos bstan gsol //
T02TD3137E:316b-9: dus gsum sangs rgyas de dag gis //
T02TD3137E:316b-11: thugs rje'i dbang gis gzigs mdzod la //
T02TD3137E:316b-12: mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD3137E:316b-13: dus gsum sangs rgyas dge ba dang //
T02TD3137E:316b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba dang //
T02TD3137E:316b-15: nyan thos rang rgyal dge ba dang //
T02TD3137E:316b-16: 'jig rten dge ba ci spyod pa //
T02TD3137E:316b-17: de dag la yang yi rang ngo //
T02TD3137E:316b-18: zag bcas dge ba ci bsags pa //
T02TD3137E:316b-19: de bzhin zag med dge ba gang ;
T02TD3137E:316b-20: / dge ba'i tshogs ni ci bsags pa //
T02TD3137E:316b-21: byang chub sems dpar sgra yang bsgrags //
T02TD3137E:316b-22: de ltar bsod nams tshogs bsags nas //
T02TD3137E:316b-24: de ltar bsod nams tshogs bsags nas //
T02TD3137E:316b-25: ye shes tshogs ni 'di lta ste //
T02TD3137E:316b-26: mu stegs skye ba tha mal bzhin //
T02TD3137E:316b-27: stong pa tsam gyis bsgyur nas ni //
T02TD3137E:316b-28: phyal bar bya ba'i ma yin te //
T02TD3137E:316b-29: dman pa yi ni byang chub bzhin //
T02TD3137E:316b-30: 'ga' zhig stong pa'i tshul la ni //
T02TD3137E:316b-31: 'ga' zhig yod pa ma yin te //
T02TD3137E:316b-32: shes rab pha rol phyin pa bzhin //
T02TD3137E:316b-33: gzugs las stong pa gzhan mi btsal //
T02TD3137E:316b-34: 'khrul ngor bstan pa'i gzugs su snang //
T02TD3137E:316b-35: gzugs dang stong pa dbyer med na //
T02TD3137E:316b-36: gzugs ni rnam par dag pa yin //
T02TD3137E:316b-37: gzugs nyid stong par shas par bya //
T02TD3137E:316b-38: dper na chu yi zla ba bzhin //
T02TD3137E:316b-39: de ltar ye shes tshogs bsags bya //
T02TD3137E:316b-40: tshogs gnyis bsags pas sgrib gnyis byang //
T02TD3137E:316b-41: bskyed rim 'byung ba'i dgos pa yin //
T02TD3137E:316b-42: de nas so so'i sgrub thabs bzhin //
T02TD3137E:316b-43: bskyed tshul lha de gsal bar bskyed //
T02TD3137E:316b-44: bskyed rim bsgom pa'i rnam gnyis te //
T02TD3137E:316b-45: rtogs pa can dang rtogs pa dman //
T02TD3137E:316b-46: rtogs pa can gyis 'di ltar bsgom //
T02TD3137E:317a-0: @317a * // gang bskyed pa yi lha de ni //
T02TD3137E:317a-1: nam mkha' yi ni 'ja' tshon bzhin //
T02TD3137E:317a-2: gsal la rang bzhin med par bsgom //
T02TD3137E:317a-3: chu la zla ba shar ba bzhin //
T02TD3137E:317a-4: snang la rang bzhin med par bsgom //
T02TD3137E:317a-5: rtogs pa dman pas 'di ltar bsgom //
T02TD3137E:317a-6: yod par rag pa'i rnam pa dang ;
T02TD3137E:317a-7: /'bur btod ris su bris bzhin du //
T02TD3137E:317a-8: gong ltar gsal ba'i rnam par bsgom //
T02TD3137E:317a-9: de ltar bskyed rim bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD3137E:317a-10: bzlas pa'i tshul ni rnam pa gnyis //
T02TD3137E:317a-11: don dam dang ni kun rdzob dang //
T02TD3137E:317a-12: don dam bzlas pa 'di lta ste //
T02TD3137E:317a-13: rtogs pa can gyi bskyed rim bzhin//
T02TD3137E:317a-14: yengs med gsal bar bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD3137E:317a-15: yul gzung 'dzin pa yongs spangs nas //
T02TD3137E:317a-16: rtogs pa thams cad bkag nas ni //
T02TD3137E:317a-17: nam mkha' stong las sgra 'byung zhing //
T02TD3137E:317a-18: sgra de yang ni rang bzhin med //
T02TD3137E:317a-19: chos nyid kyi ni rang sgra'o //
T02TD3137E:317a-20: kun rdzob phrin las bzhi bzlas pas ;
T02TD3137E:317a-21: / zhi ba'i bzlas pa 'di lta ste //
T02TD3137E:317a-22: sngags brjod sngags kyi 'od zer ni //
T02TD3137E:317a-23: nyi zer lta bur phyogs bcur 'phro //
T02TD3137E:317a-24: ma lus kun la phog pas ni //
T02TD3137E:317a-25: kun gyi gnod sems zhi byas te //
T02TD3137E:317a-26: phan sems byams sems ldan gyur nas //
T02TD3137E:317a-27: sgrub po nyid la 'dug par bsam//
T02TD3137E:317a-28: rgyas pa'i bzlas pa 'di lta ste //
T02TD3137E:317a-29: sngags 'od nyi zer lta bu ni //
T02TD3137E:317a-30: 'dom gang tshad nas khugs pa'i tshul //
T02TD3137E:317a-31: rang gi lus la phog pas ni //
T02TD3137E:317a-32: lus kyi tshe bsod rgyas par bsam //
T02TD3137E:317a-33: dbang gi bzlas pa 'di lta ste //
T02TD3137E:317a-34: sngags 'od lcags kyu lta bus ni //
T02TD3137E:317a-35: phyogs bcur 'phros te ma lus bkug / sgrub pa'i las ka ci bya zhes //
T02TD3137E:317a-36: phyag dang bcas pas 'dud par bsam //
T02TD3137E:317a-37: drag po'i bzlas pa 'di lta ste //
T02TD3137E:317a-38: sngags 'od me lce lta bus ni //
T02TD3137E:317a-39: phyogs bcu kun du 'phros pa ste //
T02TD3137E:317a-40: rang gnod bgegs rnams thams cad bsreg /
T02TD3137E:317a-41: mi bzad skad ngan chen po yis //
T02TD3137E:317a-42: sgrub pa po la skyabs gsol bsam //
T02TD3137E:317a-43: de skye thun mtshams 'di lta ste //
T02TD3137E:317a-44: gtor dbul ye shes nam mkhar dbyung //
T02TD3137E:317a-45: yid kyis phar mchod byin gyis tshur brlabs bsam //
T02TD3137E:317a-46: se gol sgra dang bcas pa yis //
T02TD3137E:317b-0: ye shes mchog @317b 'byung mgon po khyod kyis ni //
T02TD3137E:317b-1: dngos grub chen po stsal du gsol //
T02TD3137E:317b-2: slar gshegs slar yang 'byon du gsol //
T02TD3137E:317b-3: bstan bcos brtsam pa rnam gnyis te //
T02TD3137E:317b-4: sgra tshad dag las phul byung bas //
T02TD3137E:317b-5: lung dang mi 'gal don de gtan la 'bebs //
T02TD3137E:317b-6: mdo rgyud lung dang bstan bcos nas drangs te //
T02TD3137E:317b-7: de nas rten dang de dang mi 'gal ba //
T02TD3137E:317b-8: des kyang 'ga' zhig brtsam par rigs pa yin //
T02TD3137E:317b-9: sgo drug gis ni bstan bcos brtsam pa ni //
T02TD3137E:317b-10: yi dam lha yi zhal mthong dang //
T02TD3137E:317b-11: de yis gnang ba byin pa dang //
T02TD3137E:317b-12: dngos grub kun la dbang thob pas ;
T02TD3137E:317b-13: / mdo rgyud lung dang bstan bcos las drangs nas //
T02TD3137E:317b-14: de la rten dang de dang mi 'gal bas //
T02TD3137E:317b-15: des ni brtsam par rigs pa yin //
T02TD3137E:317b-16: bde gshegs rnams kyi bka' las kyang //
T02TD3137E:317b-17: bskyed rim gsal bar ma bstan te //
T02TD3137E:317b-18: bskyed rim gsal bar ma gyur na ;
T02TD3137E:317b-20: de bskyed gsal bar bstan gyur nas //
T02TD3137E:317b-21: shes rab 'chal ba'i gang zag gis //
T02TD3137E:317b-22: slob dpon med par zhugs gyur nas //
T02TD3137E:317b-23: bdag nyid phung ba kho nar zad //
T02TD3137E:317b-24: yang na de dus 'khor rnams kyis //
T02TD3137E:317b-25: bde gshegs kyi ni byin rlabs kyis //
T02TD3137E:317b-26: de ni gsol ba kho na yin //
T02TD3137E:317b-28: blo chung sems can mang gyur te //
T02TD3137E:317b-29: mdo sde rnams las lung bstan te //
T02TD3137E:317b-31: blo chung sems can mar gyur te //
T02TD3137E:317b-32: de la dgongs te bde gshegs kyis //
T02TD3137E:317b-33: nga dang 'dra ba'i gang zag gis //
T02TD3137E:317b-34: nga yi lung rnams 'grol bar bya //
T02TD3137E:317b-35: de skad lung nas 'byung ba ste //
T02TD3137E:317b-36: mtshan nyid ldan gyis bstan bcos brtsam //
T02TD3137E:317b-37: mtshan nyid mi ldan brtsams gyur nas //
T02TD3137E:317b-38: kun kyang dgongs par ma gyur pas //
T02TD3137E:317b-39: de don gzhan du bstan byas nas //
T02TD3137E:317b-40: sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur //
T02TD3137E:317b-41: slob dpon chen po ratna k'irtis mdzad pa sgrub thabs thams cad kyi las ka gsal byed ces bya ba rdzogs so//
